channel.title: How do i remove the menu bar on my client?
channel.description:
Its a menu bar at the top of my client that says "file"
When u click it theres a dropdown menu that says forums, donate,vote, and exit
How do i remove it?

item.title: How do i remove the menu bar on my client?
item.dc:creator: @rova0 rova0
item.description:
@rova0 wrote:

open Gui.java

Search for: private void initUI()

you can change it in there or remove (best to just comment out)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove the menu bar on my client?

item.title: How do i remove the menu bar on my client?
item.dc:creator: @skiersk8tr1 skiersk8tr1
item.description:
@skiersk8tr1 wrote:

Im using a 317 project-exile client

And there is no Jframe.java in it

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove the menu bar on my client?

item.title: How do i remove the menu bar on my client?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Client sided. That’s a Jframe. What client are you using? If you are using a refactored client then your best shot is to check Jframe.java

Read full topic
